thread.title: Madonna Shares Adorable Video of Newly Adopted Twins Singing 'Twinkle, Twinkle'
thread.title_full: Madonna Shares Adorable Video of Newly Adopted Twins Singing 'Twinkle, Twinkle'

author: Lynda Brendish
title: Madonna Shares Adorable Video of Newly Adopted Twins Singing 'Twinkle, Twinkle'
text: Madonna Shares Adorable Video of Newly Adopted Twins Singing 'Twinkle, Twinkle' by Lynda Brendish 4:12 PM PST, February 19, 2017 Playing Madonna Shares Adorable Video of Newly Adopted Twins Singing 'Twinkle, Twinkle' They may only be four, but recently adopted twins Esther and Stella are already taking after their new mom, Madonna, in one big way -- singing! The 58-year-old pop icon shared an adorable video of the girls on Saturday, showing them enthusiastically singing "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star" while dressed in matching striped pajamas.
